warezcdn.name: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen
warezcdn.title: Kaguya-sama wa kokurasetai ~ Tensai tachi no ren'ai zunô sen ~

imdb.title: Kaguya-sama wa kokurasetai ~ Tensai tachi no ren'ai zunô sen ~
imdb.plot: The proudly privileged top two students of an elite school each makes it their mission to be the first to extract a confession of love from the other.

episodes.title: Yu Ishigami Wants to Talk
episodes.plot: A 10 minutes teaser that introduces the upcoming 3rd season of the show.

episodes.title: Miko Iino Wants to Be Soothed/Kaguya Doesn't Realize/Chika Fujiwara Wants to Battle
episodes.plot: After finally making her long awaited smartphone debut, Kaguya restlessly contemplates over how to respond to Shirogane's LINE message.

episodes.title: Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Mediate/Kaguya Wants to Distract Him/Kaguya Preemptively Strikes
episodes.plot: Kaguya makes a big fuss when she learns that Shirogane was invited to a karaoke group date and orders Hayasaka to remove him from the venue.

episodes.title: Nagisa Kashiwagi Wants to Kill/Maki Shijo Wants to Take Action/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Be Believed
episodes.plot: Shirogane accidentally steps on a female student who had collapsed on campus, she then takes care of her in the Student Council room.

episodes.title: Kaguya Shinomiya's Impossible Demand: "A Cowrie a Swallow Gave Birth To" Part 1/Yu Ishigami Wants to Prove Himself Worthy/Chika Fujiwara Wants to Stay Over
episodes.plot: Plans are made for a sleepover at Kaguya's house. Fujiwara gets excited about the totally hot butler Mr. Herthaka without realizing it's Hayasaka dressed as a man. A sleep-deprived Kaguya takes on a strange mood and calls Shirogane.

episodes.title: Chika Fujiwara Wants to Beat a Rhythm/Ai Hayasaka Wants to Talk/Maki Shijo Wants Some Help
episodes.plot: Miyuki requested Chika to train him on rapping. When Chika asked the reason, he answered that he wanted to convey his feelings to a girl. Kaguya and Ai arrived at the location that Miyuki requested. Back at the Student Council, Maki requested for another love consultation.

episodes.title: The Student Council Wants to Move Forward/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Make Her Confess, Part 2/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Make Her Confess, Part 3
episodes.plot: Parent-Teacher Conferences to determine each student's future begin at Shuchiin Academy. Shirogane makes an important decision regarding the path he will follow.

episodes.title: Miko Iino Can't Love, Part 1/Students Wish to Discuss the Culture Festival/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Blow It Up
episodes.plot: All classes are consumed in preparation for Shuchiin Academy's Hoshin Culture Festival. Fujiwara refuses to help Shirogane make balloon art. Shirogane heads to the Student Council room to practice but finds Shinomiya there.

episodes.title: Kei Shirogane Wants to Show Off/About Kaguya Shinomiya, Part 2/Kaguya Wants to Confess
episodes.plot: Kei assembles an outfit for her brother to wear to the Culture Festival. Kaguya tries to sneak Shirogane a heart-shaped gift.

episodes.title: Spring of First Year/Kaguya's Culture Festival/Yu Ishigami's Culture Festival
episodes.plot: Shirogane remembers the first time he met Kaguya. Kaguya helps out at her class' cosplay cafe. Ishigami tries to ask out Tsubame.

episodes.title: Kozue Makihara Wants to Have Fun/Chika Fujiwara Wants to Unmask/Miyuki Shirogane's Culture Festival
episodes.plot: Class 1-A and 1-B run a haunted house. Chika tries to convince her sister that Miyuki isn't a good boyfriend material. Chika and Miyuki discuss Yu's chances of success with Tsubame.

episodes.title: Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Make Her Confess, Part 4/Tsubame Koyasu Wants to Say No/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Make Her Confess, Part 5
episodes.plot: Kaguya tries to get Miyuki to give her a heart shaped balloon. Kaguya gives someone advice on how to reject a love confession. Miyuki spends time with Kaguya during the Culture Festival.

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants to Confess, Part 2/Kaguya Wants to Confess, Part 3/Dual Confessions, Part 1
episodes.plot: The Shuchiin Culture Festival reaches its climax, but Shirogane is nowhere to be found. Kaguya consults Hayasaka. The phantom thief Arsène strikes again. Tsubame confronts Ishigami.

episodes.title: Dual Confessions, Part 2/The Shuchiin Afterparty
episodes.plot: Shroud in a cape and dressed in the guise of the phantom thief Arsène, Shirogane waited for Kaguya's arrival atop the clock tower roof overlooking Shuchiin. When they finally meet, Kaguya has something to say to him.

episodes.title: Ai Hayasaka Wants to Stave Them Off/The Student Council Has Not Achieved Nirvana/Kaguya Wants to Get Married/Kaguya Wants to Celebrate
episodes.plot: Ai replaces the coffee in Shirogane's cup with a decaf version, causing issues. The Student Council also plays a board game together and even tries to give romantic advice.

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants to Know/Kaguya Wants to Give a Gift/Chika Fujiwara Wants to Confirm It
episodes.plot: Kaguya goes on a shopping trip with Shirogane's sister in the hopes of getting the perfect birthday present. Chika becomes suspicious seeing how zealous Kaguya has become over it.

episodes.title: Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Gaze at the Moon/The 67th Student Council/Kaguya Doesn't Want to Say It
episodes.plot: The school year is ending and so is the run of the Student Council. All of the students reflect on past experiences and how they will move forward.

episodes.title: Ai Hayasaka Wants Him to Fall for Her/Kaguya Wants to Be Confessed To/Miko Iino Wants to Set Things Right
episodes.plot: Shirogane begins his re-election campaign and wants Kaguya to help him out, but that soon creates gossip around the whole school, especially when Shirogane's rival for the election finds out about it.

episodes.title: Miyuki Shirogane Wants Girls to Fall for Him/Nagisa Kashiwagi Wants to Console/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Sing/Kaguya Wants to Kick Them Down
episodes.plot: Kaguya is distraught when Shirogane shows up to school looking completely different, causing her to question if the feelings she has for him are genuine.

episodes.title: I Don't Want to Make Miko Iino Smile/I Want to Make Miko Iino Smile/Kaguya Isn't Getting Called
episodes.plot: Election Day has arrived as Shirogane and Miko compete in the race for office.

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants to Undress Him/Kaguya Wants to Make Him Let Go/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Make Her Read/Kaguya <3 Aquarium
episodes.plot: Kaguya gains a strong desire to know what kind of underwear Shirogane wears and tries to figure it out. Then Ishigami and Shirogane try to convince Kaguya to read shojo manga.

episodes.title: Miko Iino Wants to Control Herself/Kaguya Doesn't Scare Easily/Kaguya Wants to Be Examined
episodes.plot: Iino desperately tries to keep her cool while interacting with the rest of the Student Council. Kaguya and Miyuki are then trapped together in a bizarre situation; one that Kaguya has a difficult time getting over.

episodes.title: Yu Ishigami Closes His Eyes, Part 2/Kaguya Wants to Touch/Kaguya Doesn't Say No
episodes.plot: Miko Iino wants to resign from the Student Council. Meanwhile, Ishigami has joined the Cheerleader Squad.

episodes.title: Kei Shirogane Can't Speak/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Dance/Kobachi Osaragi Wants to Crack Down/Miyuki Shirogane's Dad Wants to Find Out
episodes.plot: Shirogane has to deal with familial issues involving his sister and dad while also training so that he can dance during the school's sports festival.

episodes.title: Yu Ishigami Closes His Eyes, Part 3/Miyuki Shirogane and Yu Ishigami/Kyoko Otomo Doesn't Realize
episodes.plot: Ishigami is shaken up when an unexpected visit arrives at the sport festival.

episodes.title: The Student Council Would Like a Group Photo/The Student Council Is Going to Get That Group Photo/Chika Fujiwara Wants to Inflate
episodes.plot: The contest between Kaguya and Shirogane is still on. Kaguya loses something she held dear for a long time and in return, she gets something more special.

episodes.title: OVA: Kaguya-sama Darkness Volume 1/Kaguya-sama Darkness Volume 2/Kaguya-sama wa Tabesasetai
episodes.plot: What do Shuchiin Academy's model students do outside of their student council duties? After a visit to the swimming pool, Kaguya Shinomiya and Chika Fujiwara take to the showers to wash themselves off. When Chika accidentally drops a bar of soap, the two find themselves in a rather slippery mishap. Meanwhile, Miyuki Shirogane and Yuu Ishigami examine a discarded pornographic magazine - its content bearing an uncanny resemblance to the other student council members. Later on, an intense fried rice cook-off commences as Chika and Miko Iino seek to crown a master chef ...

episodes.title: I Will Make You Invite Me to a Movie/Kaguya Wants to Be Stopped/Kaguya Wants It
episodes.plot: Shuchiin Academy is a beacon for talented students with a bright future ahead of them. The vice-president of the student council, Kaguya Shinomiya, and the president, Miyuki Shirogane, are attracted to each other, but they are both too proud to be honest about their feelings. As a result, all they do is think about how to get the other person to confess their love. Six months pass without anything happening, when one day, a pair of tickets to "the movie that turns boys and girls who see it together into a couple" won by the secretary, Chika Fujiwara, triggers the ...

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants to Trade/Chika Wants to Go Somewhere/Miyuki Wants to Hide His Ignorance
episodes.plot: The students at Shuchiin Academy are under the impression that Shirogane is an expert in romance too. But in reality, he has no romantic experience whatsoever when a male student comes to him for advice regarding a crush. In a desperate attempt to cover his lack of experience and to protect his dignity as the Student Council President, he takes on the student's request and claims, "Leave it to me!" For Kaguya, who has been eavesdropping, this becomes an excellent opportunity for her to find out Shirogane's views on love. But Shirogane's advice on love seems very ...

episodes.title: Miyuki Shirogane Still Hasn't Done It/Kaguya Wants to Be Figured Out/Kaguya Wants to Walk
episodes.plot: Fujiwara is startled when she unknowingly flips through the magazine that the principal had confiscated, and comes across a "When was your first time?" survey. The magazine reports that 34% of high school students already have that experience. While Shirogane tries to calm Fujiwara down by affirming that the number is inflated, Kaguya declares, "The percentage sounds accurate to me," and adds that she's also already experienced. Shirogane who has never been in a romantic relationship is astounded when he hears this confession. Kaguya seizes the opportunity to attack ...

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants Affection/The Student Council Wants It to Be Said/Kaguya Wants Him to Send It/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Talk
episodes.plot: Kaguya and Shirogane are somehow roped into cosplaying, when Fujiwara suggests her idea on how to welcome the sister school visiting them from Paris. Deep down, Kaguya does not take this suggestion seriously, but she still tries on the cat ears and sighs out, "meow." This instance strikes a soft spot of Shirogane, who loves cats. But as adorable as Kaguya looks, Shirogane tries to keep his cool. Meanwhile, Kaguya is just as enchanted when Shirogane also ends up trying on the cat ears. How will today's battle turn out, as the two fight to cover up their true feelings?

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants to Handle It/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Show Off/Kaguya Wants to Be Covered
episodes.plot: Despite his excellence in academics, Shirogane severely lacks in athletic ability. Which is why he has been tirelessly practicing volleyball after school. With only a week left until they begin playing in class, it all seems hopeless as there are no signs of progress and his image as the perfect Student Council President could soon be tarnished. Just as Shirogane starts losing hope, Fujiwara shows up. Swallowing his pride, he pleads her to coach him, and so Shirogane's days of training under the intense tutelage of Fujiwara begin. Will his volleyball serve improve to ...

episodes.title: Yu Ishigami Wants to Live/Chika Fujiwara Wants to Test You/Kaguya Wants to Be Noticed
episodes.plot: Yu Ishigami is the fourth member of the Student Council. Despite being a first-year, he was scouted by Shirogane for his expertise and was appointed as treasurer. Because he is introverted, Ishigami often goes unnoticed, but he is also the most indispensable member of the council. Suddenly one day, Ishigami comes to Shirogane to request his resignation. No matter how desperately Shirogane tries to persuade him to stay, he seems to have firmly made up his mind. Apparently, the situation is beyond Ishigami's control, as he begins to tear up and explains that "he's ...

episodes.title: Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Work/Kaguya Wants Him to Join In/Kaguya Wants to Control It
episodes.plot: Kashiwagi's boyfriend returns, seeking more romantic advice from Shirogane, while Kaguya yet again attempts to eavesdrop on the two. Shirogane's advice the first time around successfully brought this couple together, but the boyfriend tells Shirogane that he hasn't been able to hold hands with Kashiwagi after a month of dating. Kaguya is dumbfounded when she hears him ask, "How can I hold hands with her?" but Shirogane is relieved by this simple question that seems manageable even for someone with no experience in romantic relationships. However, Shirogane's advice ...

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants Her to Say It/Miyuki Shirogane Can't Lose/Ishigami Closes His Eyes
episodes.plot: As final exams approach, the psychological war between Kaguya and Shirogane intensifies within the Student Council Office. Kaguya is an all-around genius with her pride at stake but she has never been able to surpass Shirogane in academics. On the other hand, Shirogane is a genius through hard work, who won't allow anyone to take his position at the top of the class. In an attempt to get ahead of the other, the two lie through their teeth and it becomes a battle of finesse. At last, it's the day of finals, but which of them will the goddess of victory smile upon?

episodes.title: Kaguya Wants to Give a Gift/Chika Fujiwara Wants to Pay a Visit/About Kaguya Shinomiya
episodes.plot: Kaguya is sick at home, and a teacher has asked Shirogane to deliver her assignments to her house. When Shirogane tells the rest of the council members, Fujiwara excitedly volunteers to go in his stead. According to Fujiwara, Kaguya becomes needy when she is sick. Shirogane's heart beats fast as he imagines this cute Kaguya, but the entire Student Council couldn't possibly barge in on Kaguya when she is sick. And so, Fujiwara proposes playing a game of concentration to decide on who will visit Kaguya. Even Ishigami is dragged into what becomes a heated battle.

episodes.title: Kaguya Won't Forgive/Kaguya Wants to Forgive/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Go Somewhere
episodes.plot: Kaguya and Shirogane have seemingly reconciled after their fight from Shirogane's visit when Kaguya was sick. However, resentments linger, ready to explode at any moment. Kaguya decides to consult Kashiwagi since she has a boyfriend and tells her that she is "asking for a friend". Meanwhile, Shirogane asks Ishigami, who watches a lot of romantic comedy, about how to make up with a girl after a fight, but Ishigami ends up getting heated, as Kaguya and Shirogane get advice, the two slowly begin to realise how they truly feel about each other.

episodes.title: Ai Hayasaka Wants to Get Soaked/Chika Fujiwara Really Wants to Eat It/Miyuki Shirogane Wants to See You/I Can't Hear the Fireworks, Part 1
episodes.plot: Half a month into summer vacation, Kaguya spends her days moping around, unable to see Shirogane without the Student Council meetings. However, the Student Council members are planning on going to see the fireworks together at the end of the break. Due to her strict upbringing as the daughter of the head of a conglomerate, Kaguya has had no memorable summer experience and has been looking forward to the day she gets to see everyone.

episodes.title: I Can't Hear the Fireworks, Part 2/Kaguya Doesn't Want to Avoid Him
episodes.plot: After being forced to abandon seeing fireworks with her fellow Student Council members, Kaguya shuts herself up in her dark bedroom. Hayasaka, Kaguya's maid, is worried about her mistress's depressive state. She tries to cheer Kaguya up and when that doesn't work, introduces a plan to sneak out of the family mansion. Kaguya manages to slip past a pair of vigilant butlers and reaches the venue, but the fireworks display is already over. Kaguya is in tears, since she really wanted to see the fireworks with the others, but then she hears a familiar voice: "Then, I'll ...
